name: 32blit Scorpion Collection
description:
This is a collection of the games I have made (and am making) for the 32blit. Both .blit and .exe versions of the games are supplied (as separate .zip files).

 I recently got a 32blit and I cannot recommend it enough, and I'm using these games as my way of learning/exploring C++ and the 32blit. All the source code for them is available at https://github.com/ThePythonator.
